00008 #ifndef DYNAMICBUFFER_H
00009 #define DYNAMICBUFFER_H
00010 
00011 #include <cstring>
00012 #include <string>
00013 
00014 namespace mt {
00015 
00016 template<typename T>
00017 class DynamicBuffer {
00018 
00019 public:
00025     DynamicBuffer() : m_capacity(0), m_size(0), m_data(0) { }
00026 
00031     DynamicBuffer(size_t capacity) : m_capacity(capacity), m_size(0), m_data(new T[capacity]) {
00032         init();
00033     }
00034 
00038     DynamicBuffer(const DynamicBuffer<T>& source) : m_capacity(source.m_capacity),
00039                                                     m_size(source.m_size),
00040                                                     m_data(new T[source.m_capacity]) {
00041         copy(source);
00042     }
00043 
00047     ~DynamicBuffer() { delete[] m_data; }
00049 
00052     operator T*() { return m_data; }
00053 
00054     operator const T*() const { return m_data; }
00055 
00059     DynamicBuffer<T>& operator=(const DynamicBuffer<T>& source) {
00060         if (this != &source) {
00061             copy(source);
00062         }
00063 
00064         return *this;
00065     }
00067 
00068 
00069 
00077     void append(const T* data, size_t count) {
00078         if (m_size + count > m_capacity) {
00079             reallocateSave(m_size + count);
00080         }
00081         std::copy(data, data + count, m_data + m_size);
00082         m_size += count;
00083     }
00084 
00085     void append(const DynamicBuffer<T> buffer) {
00086         append(buffer.m_data, buffer.m_size);
00087     }
00088 
00092     void clear() {
00093         delete[] m_data;
00094         m_data = 0;
00095         m_capacity = 0;
00096         m_size = 0;
00097     }
00098 
00102     void reallocate(size_t newCapacity) {
00103         if (newCapacity > 0) {
00104             clear();
00105             m_data = new T[newCapacity];
00106             m_capacity = newCapacity;
00107             m_size = 0;
00108         }
00109     }
00110 
00115     void reallocateSave(size_t newCapacity) {
00116         if (newCapacity > m_size) {
00117             T* newData = new T[newCapacity];
00118             std::copy(m_data, m_data + m_size, newData);
00119             delete[] m_data;
00120             m_data = newData;
00121             m_capacity = newCapacity;
00122         }
00123     }
00124 
00125 
00126     T* getDataPtr() { return m_data; }
00127 
00128     const T* getDataPtr() const { return m_data; }
00129 
00130     size_t getSize() const { return m_size; }
00131 
00132     size_t getCapacity() const { return m_capacity; }
00133 
00137     void setSize(size_t size) { m_size = size; }
00138 
00141     template<typename U>
00142     friend bool operator==(const DynamicBuffer<U>& lhs, const DynamicBuffer<U>& rhs);
00144 
00145 protected:
00147     void init() {
00148         for (size_t i = 0; i < m_capacity; ++i) { m_data[i] = T(); }
00149     }
00150 
00151 
00152     void copy(const DynamicBuffer<T>& source) {
00153         if (m_capacity < source.m_size) { reallocate(source.m_size); }
00154         std::copy(source.m_data, source.m_data + source.m_size, m_data);
00155         setSize(source.m_size);
00156     }
00157 
00158 private:
00159     size_t m_capacity;
00160     size_t m_size;
00161     T* m_data;
00162 };
00163 
00164 template<typename U>
00165 bool operator==(const DynamicBuffer<U>& lhs, const DynamicBuffer<U>& rhs) {
00166     if (lhs.m_size != rhs.m_size) { return false; }
00167     for (size_t i = 0; i < lhs.m_size; ++i) {
00168         if (lhs.m_data[i] != rhs.m_data[i]) { return false; }
00169     }
00170     return true;
00171 }
00172 
00173 typedef mt::DynamicBuffer<uint8_t> ByteBuffer;
00174 
00175 } // namespace mt
